mapper.select: SELECT /*BoardMapper.pagingList*/ bi.board_id, bi.category_id, bi.writer, bi.password, bi.title, bi.content, bi.view_count, bi.system_register_datetime, bi.system_update_datetime, ci.category FROM board_info bi JOIN category_info ci ON bi.category_id = ci.category_id ORDER BY bi.system_register_datetime DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /*BoardMapper.saveBoard*/ board_info ( category_id, writer, password, title, content, system_register_datetime, system_update_datetime ) VALUES ( #{categoryId}, #{writer}, #{password}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW() );
mapper.select: select /*BoardMapper.getDetailByBoardId*/ bi.board_id, bi.category_id, (SELECT ci.category FROM category_info ci WHERE ci.category_id = bi.category_id)AS category_name, bi.writer, bi.password, bi.title, bi.content, bi.view_count, bi.system_register_datetime, bi.system_update_datetime from board_info bi where board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE /*BoardMapper.updateBoard*/ board_info SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, system_update_datetime = now() WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
UPDATE /*BoardMapper.setView*/ board_info SET view_count = view_count +1 WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT /*BoardMapper.findPasswordByBoardId*/ password FROM board_info WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
